concept-wr.shortdesc: This component contains scripts for configuring a server to collect Titanium Server logs via syslog for central presentation and analysis.

conbody.p: US77159 / US83068 new topicThis package can be used to install and configure the open-source Elasticsearch, Kibana and Logstash (ELK) packages on a remote Linux central logging server to provide a basic remote log server for Titanium Server. You can then enable the remote logging feature on Titanium Server to send logs from all hosts through the active controller to the log server over the OAM network. To enable the remote logging feature, see Titanium Server System Administration:.
